tgt_original: 於情性罪謂殺等業，遮謂女人同室宿等，非情性罪謂盜外財，遮謂掘地斷生草等。

src_original: sattvādhiṣṭhānapravṛttatvād iti.  sattvaprajñaptyadhiṣṭhānapravṛttatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 有情處者，謂諸有情及諸有情所依止處。

src_original: vartamānā eva hi dharmāḥ sattvaprajñaptyadhiṣṭhānā nātītā nānāgatāḥ.  teṣāṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 382) nirupākhyakalpatvāt.  ata evāha.  nātītānāgatehyaḥ.
tgt_original: 現蘊處界，內者即是有情所依，外者名為有情所止，非過未故。

src_original: asamāhitāvasthāyāṃ ca na saṃvarābhāvāt.  kuta eva prajñaptisāvadebhya iti.  abhyupagamābhāvāt.
tgt_original: 從有情數所發遮罪，尚不得此二種律儀，況從非情所發遮罪。

src_original: sarvakālebhyaś ceti.  atītānāgatayor api saṃvarayor lābhāt tatsahabhūcittavat.  ata eveti.
tgt_original: 從恒時者，謂從過去現在未來蘊處界得。

src_original: yasmād [Tib.43b] ete saṃvarā evaṃ labhyaṃte.  yathā vistareṇoktam.  ataś catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate.
tgt_original: 如與此戒為俱有心，由此不同應作四句，有蘊處界從彼唯得別解律儀非餘二等。

src_original: ālaṃbanāt kleśāḥ prahātavyāḥ.
tgt_original: 應知從所緣，　　可令諸惑斷。

src_original: ālaṃbanaparijñānabalena hi kleśāḥ prahīyaṃte.
tgt_original: 諸惑永斷，定從所緣，以於所緣遍知力故令惑永斷，如前已說。

src_original: dvividhaṃ cānuśayālaṃbanaṃ.  saṃyogavastu asaṃyogavastu ca.
tgt_original: 然惑所緣總有二種，謂有繫事及無繫事。

src_original: tatra saṃyogavastuviṣayāṇām anuśayānāṃ tadanuśayabalotpāditānām atadviṣayāṇām api pudgalasya saṃtāne prāptir akliṣṭacittasyāpy avicchedena pravartate.
tgt_original: 緣有繫事為境諸惑，及從此惑力所引生不緣此事為境諸惑，如是二惑於一有情現相續中引起諸得。

src_original: anāgatātītakleśahetuphalabhūtā.
tgt_original: 設無染污心現在前，此得恒行無有間斷，為去來世諸惑果因。

src_original: evam asaṃyogavastuviṣayāṇām atadviṣayāṇām api ca tadviṣayakleśapṛṣṭhasamudācariṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prāptir veditavyā.
tgt_original: 如是應知，緣無繫事為境諸惑，及因此惑勢力所引隨後現行不緣此事為境諸惑，所引起得類亦同前。 言為去來惑果因者，謂此諸得在現世時，是過去惑等流性故，說之為果；

src_original: sā hy anāgatānām utpattau pratyayagamanād dhetubhūtā bhavati.
tgt_original: 是未來惑生緣性故，說之為因。

src_original: tatra bṛhatkuśalamūlaniryātatvād brahmā.  kaś cāsau.  yo mahābrahmety ucyate.
tgt_original: 廣善所生故名為梵，此梵即大，故名大梵。

src_original: dhyānāṃtaralābhāt paścāt pūrvaṃ cyutyupapattilābhāt pramāṇādiviśeṣādibhiś cāsya mahān.
tgt_original: 由彼獲得中間定故、最初生故、最後歿故、威德等勝，故名為大。

src_original: tasya kāyo nivāsa eṣāṃ vidyate iti brahmakāyikāḥ.  brahmā purodhīyate eṣām iti brahmapurohitāḥ.  āyurvarṇādibhir viśeṣair mahābrahmā eṣām iti mahābrahmāṇaḥ.
tgt_original: 大梵所有所化所領，故名梵眾。 於大梵前行列侍衛，故名梵輔。

src_original: parīttaiṣām ābhābhāsvarabhūmim apekṣyeti parīttābhāḥ.
tgt_original: 自地天內光明最小，故名少光。

src_original: nābhāpramāṇam eṣām śakyaṃ pramātum ity apramāṇābhāḥ.
tgt_original: 光明轉勝量難測故，名無量光。

src_original: kṛtsnasthānāntarodbhāsanād ābhāsvarāḥ.
tgt_original: 淨光遍照自地處故，名極光淨。

src_original: manobhūmikaṃ sukhaṃ śubham ity ucyate.  tad eṣām anyabhūmim apekṣya parīttam iti parīttaśubhāḥ.
tgt_original: 意地受樂說名為淨，於自地中此淨最劣，故名少淨。

src_original: apramāṇaṃ śubham eṣām apramāṇaśubhāḥ.  śubhaṃ kṛtsnam eṣām iti śubhakṛtsnāḥ.
tgt_original: 此淨轉增量難測故，名無量淨。

src_original: [Tib.244a] na tadutkṛṣṭataram anyatrāsti sukham ity abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 此淨周普，故名遍淨，意顯更無樂能過此。

src_original: abhravad eṣāṃ bbūmisaṃbaṃdho nāstīty anabhrakāḥ.
tgt_original: 以下空中天所居地如雲密合，故說名雲。

src_original: saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayād iti vacanān naiṣām upari bhūmyantaram astīti anabhrakāḥ.
tgt_original: 此上諸天更無雲地，在無雲首，故說無雲。 更有異生勝福方所可往生故，說名福生。 居在方所，異生果中此最殊勝，故名廣果。

src_original: sthānāntarapratibaddhaṃ pārthagjanikaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ bṛhad eṣāṃ phalam udbhavatīti bṛhatphalāḥ.
tgt_original: 已得上品雜修靜慮，果德易彰，故名善見。

src_original: yo dharmo 'nyān dharmān nāvṛṇoti anyair vā nāvriyate.  tad anāvaraṇasvabhāvaṃ ākāśam.  tad apratyakṣaviṣayatvāt anyadharmānāvṛtyā anumīyate.  na tv āvaraṇābhāvamātram.  ata eva ca vyākhyāyate.
tgt_original: 由彼所執，實不能容餘礙色故，非虛空體被餘礙色所障礙故，餘色生時虛空開避，成無常失。

src_original: yatra rūpasya gatir iti.  yadi yan nāvṛṇoti nāvriyate vā.  tad ākāśam.  apratighā api cittādayaḥ saṃskārās tathaiveti [Tib.12b] ākāśaṃ prāpnuvanti.  na prāpnuvanti.
tgt_original: 然此虛空容受性故、非色性故，無勞開避。

src_original: pareṣām āvaraṇabhāvāt.  ṛddhimanto hi cittacaittabalena pareṣāṃ gatiṃ cittādīnāṃ vibadhnanti.  pratisaṃkhyā-apratisaṃkhyānirodhau tarhi avibandhakatvād ākāśaṃ prāpnutaḥ.
tgt_original: 虛空界體是障色故，餘色生時理應開避，謂虛空界是輕妙色，雖不障餘而被餘障，可是無常有為所攝。

src_original: na.  tayoḥ saṃyogadravyānutpattidharmāṇāṃ saṃyogaprāptiniyatarodhabhūtatvena utpattivighnarodhabhūtatvena cāvaraṇabhūtatvāt.  atha vā yasyānāvaraṇam eva lakṣaṇaṃ nānyal lakṣaṇaṃ.  tayoś cānyalakṣaṇam astīti na tau nirodhāv ākāśaṃ prāpnutaḥ.  asarvagataṃ tarhy ākāśaṃ anityaṃ vā prāpnoti.
tgt_original: 虛空相者既不障餘亦非餘障，色法生位寧是無常有為所攝？

src_original: tatrāpi kuḍyādyavakāśadānād ākāśam asty eva.  yadi hi tatrākāśaṃ na syāt tasyaiva kuḍyāder anavakāśatvād avasthānaṃ na syāt.  yat tu tatra rūpāntarasyānavasthānam.  tat kuḍyādyāvaraṇān nākāśābhāvāt.
tgt_original: 然壁等中有障礙者，由有礙色居彼障餘，非空無為彼中無故。

src_original: ity evaṃ kṣetrabījasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukrama ukto bhavati.  ata eva ca paṃca skandhā nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsa iti.
tgt_original: 如是已說諸蘊次第。 於界處中應先辯說六根次第，由斯境識次第可知。

src_original: (I.23) paṃca vartamānaviṣayatvāt pūrvaṃ uktānīti.  yāni [Tib.46a] vartamānaviṣayāni.
tgt_original: 頌曰： 前五境唯現，　　四境唯所造，

src_original: tāni parisphuṭaviṣayāṇi.  vartamānaviṣayāṇi ca pūrvavṛttīni bhavanty evaṃ ca pūrvam uktāni.  manas tv aniyataviṣayam ity ākulaviṣayitvāt asugamaṃ.  paścādvṛtti ca prāyeṇa.
tgt_original: 餘用遠速明，　　或隨處次第。

src_original: kiṃcid anadhvaviṣayam asaṃskṛtaviṣayam ity arthaḥ.  evam aniyataviṣayaṃ manaḥ.
tgt_original: 意境不定，三世無為，或唯取一或二三四，是故後說。

src_original: sugamaṃ hi loke pūrvam upadiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate.  bhautikārthāc catuṣṭayam  iti cakṣurādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpādyupādāyarūpaviṣayaṃ.  tasmāt.
tgt_original: 所言四境，唯所造者前流至此，五中前四境唯所造，是故先說。

src_original: tat kāyāt pūrvam uktaṃ.  kāyasya tv aniyato viṣayaḥ.
tgt_original: 身境不定，大種造色俱為境故，所以後說。

src_original: kadācid bhūtāni kadācid bhautikaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 51) yadi vyavacchedagrahaṇaṃ.  kadācid ubhayaṃ yady avyavacchedagrahaṇaṃ.  śeṣaṃ punar itarasmād yathāyogaṃ dūrāśutaravṛttyā pūrvam uktam iti.  śeṣaṃ cakṣurādi.
tgt_original: 或時身根唯取大種，或時身根唯取造色，或時身根俱取二種，是故身識有說極多緣五觸起，謂四大種、滑等隨一。

src_original: tad itarasmāt saṃbhavato dūrāśutaravṛttyā dūravṛttyā dūrataravṛttyā āśutaravṛttyeti vibhajya dvayaṃ dvayāt.  ekaṃ caikasmāt punar ekaṃ caikasmād iti yojyam ity arthaḥ.  katham ity āha.
tgt_original: 有說極多緣十一起，餘謂前四，如其所應，用遠速明，是故先說。

src_original: nānyeṣām āśrayaḥ sa iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhāśrayaprasiddhir na bhavati.  ṣaṣṭhasyāpy ayam āśrayo bhavati saṃbhavataḥ.  ālambanaṣaṭkam api.
tgt_original: 彼說如餘，云何如餘？ 謂為六識作所依者建立為內，不為六識作所依者建立為外。

src_original: sarvadharmasvabhāvo dharmadhātur aṣṭādaśadhātusvabhāva ity arthaḥ.  katham asyādhyātmikabāhyadhātuvyavasthā sidhyati.  cakṣurādayo hi dvādaśādhyātmikā iṣyante.  ṣaḍ bāhyā iti.
tgt_original: 如是眼等雖法處攝，與受等同是所依故，而立為內不立為外，所餘法處唯名為外。

src_original: pāryāyikam eṣām ādhyātmikabāhyatvaṃ.  vijñānānām āśrayās te cakṣurādaya ity ādhyātmikāḥ.  manovijñānaviṣayatvāt tu bāhyā iti.
tgt_original: 謂作眼等識所依時立為內性，若作意識所緣境時立為外性。

src_original: sūtravirodhāt.
tgt_original: 違契經故。

src_original: evaṃ hi sūtra uktaṃ.
tgt_original: 如契經說：
